articles.title: India’s boxing team reaches Dubai for Asian C’ship after delayed flight landing
articles.description: The Boxing Federation of India issued a statement, thanking the Indian ambassador to the UAE for his assistance but did not get into details of what caused the delay in the flight's landing.
articles.content:
The tournament starts on Monday with the draws lined up for Sunday. (File)

articles.title: Coronavirus: Production of Sputnik V vaccine in India to begin in August
articles.description: DB Venkatesh Varma, India’s ambassador to Russia, said that eventually, 65% to 70% of the Sputnik vaccines will be made in India.
articles.content:
India will begin producing the Russian-made coronavirus vaccine Sputnik V in August, DB Venkatesh Varma, India’s ambassador to Russia, said on Saturday, according to ANI.

articles.title: Air India says February's data breach affected 4.5 million passengers
articles.description: Hackers have stolen data on about 4.5 million Air India passengers around the world in the latest breach reported by a major airline.
articles.content:
MUMBAI: Hackers have stolen data on about 4.5 million Air India passengers around the world in the latest breach reported by a major airline.
Names, credit card numbers and passport information were among the data stolen, Air India said in a statemen... [1527 chars]
